lines.text: What kind of potions do you make?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Salves. Balms. Whatever ails you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing ails us currently, but that changes frequently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love her so much!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are your wares?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm standing in the corner with my head in my arm going: Ask her about healing potions!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're in the corner in Blair Witch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want more!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Raise your hand if you want off the ride.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have the ability to heal wounds, but is there any other condition that your potions can restore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've prepared a few antivenoms."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That might be useful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that important around these parts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Might be. I don't know, I don't travel too far."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been here, Madam Musk?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What was your question?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As long as the elements around me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispered) What? You said you've recently made antivenom potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the hands comes up and points over, and there's a small shelf to the side. The door's locked. "In there, I keep them."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill this woman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Did you recently make them due to a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Influx of poisonings?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! An influx of venomous things coming to you that you could do that? Is that why they're-- I'm so nervous. She's freaking me out, Fjord. She's freaking me out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You're point blank.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take a few steps back and I just, you know--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gesture wildly? To accomodate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just like to be prepared, that's all."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm ducking down. I really want to try to get a look at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you accept as payment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gold or trade."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not souls, or faces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you offering?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't. First off, she's lying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sadly, he has neither.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! It's going to be an actual baby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay tuned for Monday's Kickstarter launch! The Legend of Vox Machina animated special.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is everything I've wanted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to be amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to point out it's another chair. I feel they're connected.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean, this woman's chair? The wicker chair?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've had wooden chair, this is now the order of the wicked wicker chair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's one step crazier than that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will be the society of the stool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Legend of Vox Machina: not a single character with tiny hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you looking to buy?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it just the antivenom, or do you have any other wares for sale?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do have another healing potion, but I can't make more, because I'm out of tumor moss."

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: Tumor moss?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tumor moss."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It needs two mimosas? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little orange juice, a little champagne.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the biggest throwback yet.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Tumor moss?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tumor moss, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tumor moss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I usually have to send a boy out to get it for me, but the local patches have dried up, so--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. The farmlands and the livestock have been affected by something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know a place where there is some, if you want to get it for me, like a nice goblin."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the weirdest production of The Secret Garden ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I definitely think we should get some for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where do you know that there is tumor moss that still grows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Surrounded by seven trees, this grove is. The small bank, there. There you'll find the strongest batch of tumor moss this side of Xhorhas."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want sheet music to that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. How much for the antivenom stuff that you have made?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have four prepared. 50 gold apiece."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll buy all four of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you have that much money after we just spent money on the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clanging) "Oh no, you've made a mess."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go, and I'll help pick it up, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll pick it up and put it in her tiny doll hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've got it!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grandmother, we have heard rumors about--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hood shifts in your direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My parents told me stories about things like this. Grandmother, we have heard rumors in this city of a strange presence. I understand you're in this home much of the time, but have you heard any rumors about anything otherworldly in a way you are not familiar with here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have the dodecahedron if you need it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Didn't help. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Old Potis apparently went crazy and murdered his family."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Old Potis?

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Portis?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did Old Potis used to live?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was executed but two days ago."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they board up his house, or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I don't leave this hut."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How did they kill him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't leave this hut."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go check out his house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you sustain yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have my ways."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muffled hysterics)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, you seem uncomfortable. Would you like to wait outside?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling) I'd just like to ask what the name-- if I were to look up under equipment, are these four vials of poison resistance called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll show you at the break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you bring me tumor moss, I can make you more healing potions."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At a massive discount, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head slowly nods in your direction, twitches a bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for fun, I'm going to detect undead, just to see what's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Kill this bitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to do an insight check when she said she'll trade in fate or whatever. If she was joking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trade in--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was like, "Would you trade in fate or give our fortunes?" She was like, "Are you offering?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check. What were you checking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You concentrate and focus to sense that negative void aura that seems to emanate from creatures that are held together through necromancy. Nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19 total.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Each whisper is an opportunity. A whispertunity--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A whispertunity?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To tell you about the awesome merch that's in the Critical Role shop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Hey, we've got some shirts, like the one that Travis Willingham's wearing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's such a good shirt. That's a ladies' small.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's true? There's a Traveler bumper sticker. It might be in there, but I'm not sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, that is maybe a good plug.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you find anything? Yeah? No? Did you get a vibe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no vibe. Everything is copacetic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go check out that house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a good lead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a pretty good lead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be safe out there."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking-- let's just kill her. Nobody's going to come in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We will be safe. Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we see her face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're leaving, I'm going to kneel down and say: You are doing such a good job, like so, so creepy. I'm so impressed with you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 18 for a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the size of the hood, you see this tiny little snout poke through and then pull back in, and the whole body seems to recoil into the chair a bit and get still.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, I won't tell anyone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shh, Shh!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Go now. Please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys exit Madam Musk's tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is so weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As soon as we exit, I turn around. Is it still there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn around... it's still there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we please eat or go check out the boarded-up house? One or the other, just whatever direction is further away from this fucking place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So many mysteries!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, we're starving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, the house, the house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it felt like that was several people, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Madam Musk was super creepy and stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said, "You guys are doing a great job."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No I didn't. I'm sure of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were really cute, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The kobolds!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There were kobolds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, there were kobolds under there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh! She wants to be creepy, okay? Let her be creepy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what's happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're saying that was just a bunch of kobolds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it was an act?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those type of creepy people, they're always acts. They're scammers. That's how they make their living.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was amazing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She was very eloquent, compared to our past experience with-- okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't fool me. I was totally comfortable in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were scared out of your bejeebees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, by just a couple of kobolds in a little cloak. Look at you. Big man--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh! She's making a whole business off of it. Don't say anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't even take three kobolds in a trenchcoat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See what happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know how to get you! Go put a blanket over my head and get some sticks. Ooh! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we are going to check out this murderer's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four houses down on the left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Old crazy Potis. Portis?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The house at the end of the road.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The murder house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head west back through the square, passing the Four Corners on the right, and Baron Visco's butchery to the left. Going four houses down to the left, you see a small home, maybe three rooms total. The wood's warped, and the building itself leans a little bit to the right, but it's closed up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look like there's locks or barricades, or police-line, do-not-cross tape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is not a police line, but it does appear to be locked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it look lived-in still, or does it look closed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good, my best thing to roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Chimneys, holes, gaps, big enough for a cat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look at the house, and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four walls. Roof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going to pick the lock. I'm going to pick the lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a d20 check, with your proficiency modifier and dexterity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anybody watching? I want to look and make sure nobody's watching when Nott does that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will provide a meat-shield barrier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I mean, there's a lot of people walking through this street, and you're going to the front door to pick it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a back door? I want to do a little scout around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Too late!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While Nott's working on it, I want to scout the perimeter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no back door. It's small enough to the point where there's really only one entrance and exit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Windows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one window, in the back, but it's boarded shut.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull on the boards a little bit. Do they seem like they're in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're recently nailed, so they're not weathered and losing their strength. But they're boards. They can be broken or pushed in with enough force.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. How you doing, Nott? I come back around the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Almost done! 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26? (lock clicks, creaking) Door opens up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do a scan, anyone watching us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I was trying to do too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You as well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural one, so I'm distracted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a couple of folks that are looking over strangely as Nott picks open the door, and they're like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want to create a diversion or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's our house that we left stuff in, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this rough-and-tumble looking hobgoblin; red skin, pointed nose, dark hair that tumbles past the ears that point backwards and this big square jaw approaches and goes, "Hey, hey. What's your business?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Potis owed us some money. We were going to collect some of his furniture to repay the debt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a 15, "All right. Makes sense." Turns around and walks around. It was more like, "What are you doing?" Didn't seem to be too inquisitive; once you said that, it was like, "Oh, I get it," and just walked away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was very impressive. What is wrong with people here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will stay an outside sentry, and we'll all go into the house real fast; take a look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll pop in the house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pop in as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk inside. It's very lightly furnished, and sets a theme for probably how a lot of this city is. There is a simple table with a couple of chairs. You can see another table that's used for dining mostly, and smaller chairs. This looks like maybe a family lived here? What you do notice is the floor around the dining table to the left, and near the entranceway that goes into what might have been a bedroom, is just puddles of dried blood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. Any rifts to the Abyss?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One story, right? Not two stories?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One story, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anything of that kind whatsoever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head towards the bedroom, where the bloodstain seems to be coming from, take a look around. I'm also looking to see if there's a basement of any kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking for a basement, you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll follow him; as someone who has left blood before, I want to Will Graham this room and see if I can ascertain how this happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I look for any loose floorboards, papers, places that people might hide scrawlings, hidden compartments?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it look like where the blood came from? Where were the bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what an investigation check would allow. You rolled a what? A six? You're (hmph) it's escaping your peripheral.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13, not too bad. Looking around the bedroom, you can see where it looks like there was probably one death on the bed itself. It looks like the splatter-patterns across the ground was there was some sort of a struggle. There are two other smaller puddles, where three bodies eventually laid to rest and bled out. So there were three deaths here: one large, on the bed, and then two smaller ones in the dining area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything in the closet? I'm going to check all the rooms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no closet. There are drawers and stuff, but the place has already been stripped clean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like they were killed and put in a place, or does it look like they were killed and just fell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell, really.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to sit on the floor and pull out my spellbook and slap it down and take the time to cast Detect Magic as a ritual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and what were you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 23 to look for loose floorboards, places that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shelves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hidden shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look around--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feeling under desks, doing the Cobalt Soul thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a simple abode, so at least you confirm for yourself that there isn't something you're missing, as far as the structure itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Aww, poo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Detecting magic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It takes a little bit, he's still casting on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a little bit, you cast Detect Magic. Nothing. The house seems pretty abandoned, cleaned out, and whatever remnants of these murders took place, this individual, this Old Potis you heard about, apparently did this, and was executed a couple of days ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we go eat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I burn another spell slot to return myself to looking like Jester as a boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go eat. Maybe we can ask around at the pub or whatever, the tavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, whatever. Who cares.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe they'll know where Potis worked or something; maybe he was exposed to something there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seems like a lot of people have been exposed to this crazy-making miasma.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he woke up from a bad dream and killed everyone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe he ate some bad meat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe-- Fjord, Oh my gosh, what if in your bad dream sometime, you're going to wake up and murder all of us when we're in our bubble hut?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know when I am going to murder all of you is in five minutes if we don't fucking eat something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going there right now! We're walking there, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Walk faster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll go gossip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the barn!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the Four Corners!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys head back out into the main thoroughfare, over to the Four Corners tavern. As you approach, you can already see their-- Sorry, you wanted something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Timoch and Ude on the way out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they would be on the southeastern side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach, there are two figures; one is a large, burly orc and another that appears to be a bugbear, are dragging a body out from the front.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From the front of where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From inside of the Four Corners and they're dragging it out onto the street.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a dead body, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a limp body, and in a second, you can see it's another orc.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too much to drink, that one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is bloodied and the lip is split, and one of the eyes is swollen shut. There's spatters of his own blood across the chest. They both sit there and look at him and it's like, "Poor bastard!" kick him in the side, (grunt) "Wake up!" and he goes and takes a tankard that the bugbear was holding in the other hand and pours it over his face. The orc on the ground goes, (gasping, coughing) "Did I win?" They're like, "Piss off, we lost money on you!" and they walk back inside and leave the orc there on the ground, dazed. There's chatter and discussion and conversation and chuckles, guttural voices and high-pitched voices, and whiny laughter, and faint, discordant music, all emanating from the open doorway to the Four Corners as you step within. We're going to go ahead and take a break now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Mos Eisley Cantina theme) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll return here in a few minutes, guys. We do have our fantastic Wyrmwood giveaway, from our friends at Wyrmwood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Wyrmwood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, if you haven't seen it yet, there's a video on social media on how they made this DM screen, and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Holy moly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tonight is the purpleheart dice tray, made famous by our fantastic Scanlan Shorthalt from the last campaign.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiefling-colored.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again, this is for US, Canada, except for Quebec. We will have a winner when we return here in a few minutes. We'll see you guys in a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [80's-style drum intro] ♪ You've got the perfect warlock, her weapons and supplies. ♪ ♪ But you need a place to track your stuff 'cause you're so disorganized! ♪ ♪ You click open the web page you heard about on Critical Role, ♪ ♪ and now you're ready to kick some butt in that mine shaft full of gnolls! ♪ ♪ It's D&D! (D&D, yeah!) D&D Beyond. ♪ ♪ Yeah, D&D! (D&D, yeah!) D&D Beyond. ♪ ♪ You've got your stats, you've got your swords, and you've got your invisible wand! ♪ ♪ It's D&D! (D&D!) D&D, D&D Beyond! ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: TRAVIS (VO): Last time, on Yee-Haw Game Ranch:

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Maybe since--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Whoa, whoa! What are you doing?! I just got off my horse! What are you-- Dude, did you send Gary running?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) I punched the horse!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Did you punch Gary?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (still laughing) Yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Dude! Can I slide down this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aww, good, yes-- Don't you die!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What's your horse's name, Big Wanger?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Henry'll get that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: If we ride our horses side-by-side, I wonder if we can jump onto each other's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet so. Look how lathered I am.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Why are you soaking wet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I was working hard.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: At what? That race?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You are buttered up and ready for Thursday night action, baby! Okay, dude.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That one is going to be so disgusting by the time it makes it into your mouth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (choking)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: No, but this is raw animal fur.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [banjo intro] ♪ Travis Willingham's Yee-Haw Game Ranch! ♪ Yeehaw! TRAVIS (VO): Previously, on Mame Drop:

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quiz & Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is so ridiculous!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Oh, we're doing a dragon, okay. I was really into a wolf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Went from green dragon in one game to green dragon in the other!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven points, we can do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling) You don't breathe fire! It's pois-- ugh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Pot pourri?" (laughing) We'll do potpourri. Dried flowers, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We know so much about it. Which of the following is not featured on the Great Seal of the United States? 13 birds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I totally knew that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What profession was Charles Atlas in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bodybuilding. Anybody who went to the Rocky Horror knew--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, yeah! Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the only reason I know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is the sign of the zodiac is known as--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Taurus!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I didn't even finish the question!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, are we waiting for you to finish reading from now on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's my own fault. How many bricks are in the Empire State Building?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten million! (chuckling) I guessed, I didn't really know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is January's birthstone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I should know this... garnet. My birthday's in January, this is obviously rigged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just going to let you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Question six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Chicago's O'Hare airport is the country's busiest. Which is the second busiest?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dallas/Fort Worth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (maniacal laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is revenge for Soul Calibur, isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, I'm feeling it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where was the first McDonald's hamburger store--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pasadena, California!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (frustrated growl) We're playing Street Fighter after this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. This dragon is apparently my bro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) [chill music]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like that?

lines.name: BABS
lines.text: (sigh) [music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back, everybody. Before we jump back in, we do have a winner tonight. The winner is: 3nd720, 3 like number three, nd, 720! Congratulations.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a bot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could be. They've chatted twice in our chat room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (robotic voice) Thank you for the Wyrmwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to step into the interior of the Four Corners. Immediately, you can see the arched, barn-roof-type interior, a good 20 or so feet off the ground at its apex, and it is a central apex that runs from the front to the back, with a somewhat-curved, barn-like top. There are rafters pointed across, and there are different boxes and barrels placed up in the edges for storage reasons. To your right, there is a bar being run by a somewhat jovial, grinning bugbear that has mashed some sort of wax into very heavily-grown fur on the face, and pulled it into a tri-pointed moustache/goatee appearance; but it's just a continuation of the fur. He is in mid conversation. There are a good seven or eight tables scattered amongst the room, with candles on them that are burned halfway down with wax splatters across the center. The room is filled with all kinds of unique people. You see gnolls: one in the far corner and one to the far left, sitting there with large tankards, drinking and conversing. Probably a half-dozen goblins or so, scattered around the interior. Some orcs; a few Kryn drow in here as well. As you all step into the interior chamber, the energy comes to a slight standstill as everyone looks over to the brightly-colored and different individuals.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Punch me. (impact, groan)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was such an invitation, I couldn't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was. I'm not going to make you roll martial arts damage, but your dex modifier is...?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just my dex mod? Plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It clocks you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I could have done a little less fervor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you stop for a second, the whole crowd raises an eyebrow or grumbles to themselves and chuckles, and they all go back to their business.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give them all a little bit of the crazy eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you do notice also, is to the front left of your entryway, a large portion of the central chamber on the far left corner is a gravel pit. A 35-foot by 35-foot gravel pit that encompasses the center, and there is a chair set at each corner of this pit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure it's for doing foley work, or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Deep joke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see sections of the gravel seem to be darkly stained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Semen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sitting in one of the chairs, you see a really thick, muscular ogre. Most ogres you see are very muscular in general, but also carry a rather hefty amount of thick ogre skin and fat that also makes them a walking powerhouse, or sledgehammer. This is a pretty cut ogre. You can see a lot of muscle definition, and it's currently removing wraps from his hands where there are blood stains across it. You see two other individuals, two gnolls that are currently having fresh drinks poured into their glasses and mugs, as they themselves are beat to shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the other chairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, are they in the other chairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as the ogre finishes unwrapping its wrappings on its hands, it walks over and scoops it up, as well as a nice helping of gravel, into a pouch. He goes off and orders a drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you see that guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's a fighter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to be his friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His friend, I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go up to the bar. I sit down. I'll buy you that drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You say this to ogre?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The ogre is leaning forward, and you come up to about the waist of this ogre. The guy's almost bending at a 45-degree angle to rest his shoulders on the edge of the bar, and as soon as you say this, the head twitches a little bit to hear you, and then just continues to ignore you, staring ahead at the bartender who is in the process of getting a pretty hefty cask from underneath the bar and bringing it up on top. The bartender, the bugbear, glances over at you and gives you a look, a little wink, and continues to prepare to pop it while the ogre shoves this large, dinged-to-shit tankard, that was previously attached to the side of his belt, forward toward the bartender, and continues to not acknowledge your existence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Not a bad night of work, huh? It's pretty good. Sad I missed the fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stick around. There's always more." Doesn't even look at you, just keeps looking forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Stick around, there's always more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you throw your hat in the ring for something like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now the head turns towards you, and you can see one of the eyes is destroyed. The right eye in the head, it looks like it's taken some heavy damage, and has healed back enough to not become a necrotic problem, but the iris is split and it's not a functional eye; it's ruined. It doesn't move in the socket. The other eye shifts over towards you, and the jaw on this ogre is a series of heavy scars where it's been split in three different places and healed back over. A broken, jagged row of teeth and curved tusks tangle outside of the lower jaw. You see sprigs of attempted chin hair that end up being just a tuft of just seven or eight longer hairs that tangle into this awkward, thin braid or lock that just drifts, and taps the edge of the top of the clavicle as the head shifts and looks towards you, and he says, "If you're looking to enter, just drop your ante." He points back to the gravel pit. "I'd be happy to take it from you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You going to be fighting next? Is it like a reigning champion type of thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if I don't like what you drop, "I leave it to the riff-raff."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And everyone else is the riff raff, not you, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sniffs) "You smell like human."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's accurate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a terrible smell."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I've heard that before. Jesus, okay. Come on, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Makes me hungry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to ignore that, and I have one more question for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No more questions," and he turns back and takes the tankard from the bar, now filled, tosses a couple of silver pieces over the bar towards the bartender from the winnings that he pulled out from the center of the gravel pit and just stomps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll fight you for a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just sits down and keeps drinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. I'll fucking get a drink and get back over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you going to ask him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wanted to hear if he's been having nightmares.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a good detective.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought she was going to ask him out or something. It was weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did? Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wasn't aware that was an option.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He did say I smelled very nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said you made him hungry, I heard it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I have that effect on people, sometimes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nicely done. Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bartender sits there waiting. The bugbear goes, "Hey. Hey, you want something?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll just get an ale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. What's your name?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's yours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Resk. Resk the Mad. What's your name?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Risk the Mad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Resk!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Resk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, that's the one."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau the Sane... currently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For now. One ale coming up." It turns around and goes and starts pouring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What made you mad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ha. Lots of things."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the most recent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lots of questions. Makes me real mad."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, questions make you mad. Okay. Why does everyone here-- it feels like they're hitting on me, but also insulting me at the same time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is so blatantly obvious that Beauregard is going to start a bar brawl in here. I'm pulling my cloak over to hide my person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think people here don't like answering questions, Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, a City of Beasts thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe ask him why people don't like answering questions. That might shed some illumination on the problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's still a question, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anyone sitting in this whole place that's at a table by themselves, maybe like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one table on the far right side, back end. It's a smaller table, and there's only one individual sitting there. It is a drow. It is a female drow, dark, black hair across the light blue-gray skin tone. Hair is pulled back into a very, very tight ponytail that is then multiple-times bound, so it's almost like a series of periodic bindings to where it drags the lower back. Flowing clothes, no Kryn armor necessarily, so you don't get the sense that this is a soldier of the military, and is currently clutching hands around a drink and just staring right at Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten o'clock, back of the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around, look at him. Her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a lady.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a lady? Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go talk to her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean? Yes! We are here for information.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe your smell is making her hungry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm telling you! Everyone is horny over me here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It occurs to me that I'm hungry. I'm going to order some food. My god-- I'm going to go to the bar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are here for information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Nice to meet you!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nice to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, you are just an interesting one, aren't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you are the first person to say that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like the colors, you are very bright."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Okay. You hungry?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, whatever you've got in the kitchen, I think I'd love to feed my friends and have a fine meal. Especially if you have any-- if we can get an assortment of meats and vegetables, would be really great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Like a breakfast spread."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a breakfast spread.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Hold on, just a second. Get the breakfast spread! I'm right, on it." You notice as he talks, he shouts an order to himself and then responds from the other side and goes off and starts making food out of the small kitchen shack that's attached to the outside of the barn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's just talked to himself, you're saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think there's two people in one right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's the Mad-- Never mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought he was just angry at you. I mean, people seem to be, on occasion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh okay, everyone's in a mood. I'm going to go over to the drow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to tag along, a little behind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to wait for breakfast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's Captain Heat and we are the one who is in the mood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sit back at the table.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I sit down. This seat taken?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been cold, I'm not used to this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are you from?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She starts drinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Traveling, touring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is your destination?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Currently, it's this barn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, congratulations, you made it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did. Feel pretty good about that, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You should."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looking for someone, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then I hope you find them."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like a lot of people are missing these days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dangerous places, these fields."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grabs the drinks and stands up and walks away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Fucking shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As they go past, can I just try to brush up against them, and just see if I can-- are they holding anything in their pouches?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have some pouches, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going to try to pick a pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goddamn it. That's the beginning of the end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sleight of hand, 29. Just a random pocket, I'm not going for anything in particular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. You reach up and not even looking reach. It takes a second for your fingers to find a pouch, but something cylindrical and cold finds your grasp. You pull it outside and dart off, and no one seems to make any note of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When I touched its form it seemed all there? No illusions or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five? Seemed all there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I get any type of feeling on what she was looking for when she was staring through my soul?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, all right. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't tell if it was an offense or something more sinister, you don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does she leave Beau or the whole establishment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Left Beau, just moved over to back wall and is now, after passing by Nott, is just leaning in the back wall with the tankard and is still keeping a side eye towards Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go back to the group.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you make her so horny that she had to go relieve herself?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty sure she wants to kill me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not near the group, I will look at what I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a greater healing potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's mine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's legit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, pass it over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think we should go talk to her again? First of all, what are we doing here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make my way over to where she is standing, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you're going to go talk to her? Wait! Don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are going to corner this one wom-- oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go near and just watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As I start making my way over, I have a bit of a (hiccup, slurring) sway in my swagger. I get near her table and I'll trip and fall into the chair. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's your name? (hiccup)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You want to know my name?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry. (hiccup) I probably shouldn't ask. Seems like more trouble than it's worth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It always is. If you want to know, throw something in the ring."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you-- (hiccup) are you a fighter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have been known to throw a fist every now and then."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't need any more of that. Did you see that filthy fucking human punch me right in my goddamn kisser? (snort)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did. Did you deserve it?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (softly) I can't remember. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sigh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is one of them doing in a place like this? Can you believe it? (hiccup)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Steps over and walks away from you to the other side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So proud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys suck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll sit down in her chair, look at the group and be like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It sounds like if we want to talk to this lady, you're going to have to beat her up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think to get any amount of fucking respect in here, we're going to have to beat some fucking ass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm willing to do it. I think it's a fisticuffs thing. I think it's a no-armor thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's four people against each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you join me. But we don't really tell-- you know, we don't project that we're necessarily fighting each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha just quietly goes (cough).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, Yasha honestly right now is looking uncomfortable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Genuinely is like, "Normally I'd be into this kind of thing, but maybe not here." She's looking around the room nervously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is everything okay, Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. Just, you know, I... This is where I'm from, and maybe don't want to make a scene."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh fuck, are we embarrassing you? (whispering) Are we those people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are those people, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's fine. Your plan was fine. You and Jester fight. You'll win. It'll just be down to you and you. One of you throws the fight, I assume. Maybe you should work that out ahead of time. Then we'll get tons of respect and we'll ask all our questions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Throw something in there, and start fighting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's not think about these things too much. (loudly) Show me what you've got!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. I take...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here. I pull one of those jade stones and I slap it into Beauregard's hand. Use this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many jade stones do you have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four? There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you have two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have two and I gave her one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: what seems right? What seems good?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A jade stone worth 100 gold pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's plenty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just use the stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want some bloody manacles?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But look, somebody just put a locket in there and he like...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a crossbow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll throw another ten gold, and I take the bloody manacles because that seems hardcore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bloody manacles, gold, jade piece (clinks).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy footsteps)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. Oh fuck, oh wait. Okay--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, we should team up and then-- (hushed) when it's just us then we... you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Who wants to throw? Should we go based on like how it's going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I'll throw it to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you walk out on your own and drop the contents of your hand into the center (thudding and jingling) in the middle of the gravel. At which point about seven different characters in the interior of the Four Corners sit up and look over in the direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go take a seat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go take a seat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the chair?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In one of the chairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaches and grabs the bag of recent winnings and looking at you, throws it on top of your ante in the center and walks over to where you're sitting and goes, "Move out of my chair."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I go sit in another chair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) What is the sequined glove?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The single, white, sequined glove was my stupid artifact that I started the campaign with.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Michael Jackson.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like he said, like a Michael Jackson glove? That's amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you drop your sequined glove, you see a few faces of nearby onlookers. Like three goblins on the edge look in and go (eager panting, hmph).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe put some actual money--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's magic?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's magical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Looking at the monk in the mirror.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's magical everyone! It's magical!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But in like, a decorative sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A green-scaled dragonborn in a breastplate of armor, that looks themself a little bit drunk but is well-armed, sits up and begins walking towards the gravel pit. Right before his foot touches the gravel, there's this blur of motion and the drow female from earlier is now in the pit, cutting him off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Everybody wants Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't let me down, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have no idea any of this is happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Food begins to arrive for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey guys I got the-- oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (munching)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to get your asses kicked, you didn't eat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As everyone is preparing--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I bring it back to the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going to cast Mage Hand. Just have it invisible nearby. Just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll throw-- yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're eating breakfast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm eating breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're already eating breakfast. They're already at the chairs. If you're going to cast anything you have to walk up to them and do it visibly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that's fair though, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that doesn't seem fair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take it from me: I've gotten thrown in jail for that before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no. That sounds like cheating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So it is Beauregard, the drow, Jester still stands at the center-- or no, you're over in a chair and the ogre sits. The drow and the ogre are now looking at Jester expectantly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh come on. I put a glove in and stuff! Hold on. I only have one thing that's worth anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need some money?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out my diamond that I bought with Caduceus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's worth 300.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you put the diamond in the center?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that too much?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Too late now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Jester?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll win it back, just like they say in Vegas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take my glove back, and put it on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, put it on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you have a glove for the battle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shamone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When the diamond hits, everyone in the room goes (gasp) and the ogre looks at you with this big grin and goes, "Heh heh heh." He then reaches back and pulls a shortsword in his hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, a shortsword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a whatever-weapons-goes-type brawl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, whatever goes, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, whatever goes from their perspective.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So if Jester summons some unicorns, people might get pissy? Is that--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who knows? We'll find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to find out. (yelling) We're going to find out! Bring me the ring! Woo whee!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chanting and table banging)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do? Oh no! I am so out my league in this ring!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: D&D Beyond, everybody. Fine corporation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Maybe we go for the orc first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's huge!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at that ogre! Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. The pit is most of the bar!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am going to throw up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What have we done?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to lose a diamond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have anything!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got those houses so quick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could have thrown in, like 50 silver would have done it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We saw these together at Colville's joint.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Were you guys just watching from the side here? Found a separate table?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was getting breakfast, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sitting at the drow's table.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I understand why they call it the Four Corners!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to make sure I have 30 feet of clearance for the whole thing, in case I have to start keeping people from getting beat to death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, where would you like to be?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I'll stand by the door right here, near where Beauregard is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha creeps over to this side, across the other side of the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are none of us over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to be over there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's crowded around my corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. Caduceus, you're here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as the whole thing is within 30 feet of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to get closer for that, but right now everyone is crowding up to the outside of the gravel pit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go join Caleb over there with whatever breakfast I can manage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think I've ever done a bar fight, really. I don't think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Teamwork makes the dream work here, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Until it's just you two, and then: blood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think it's going to get to that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill her. No mercy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Weapons, arms, legs, eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all now moving in to form this space around. That being the case, I am going to need everyone to roll initiative, please. By everyone, that would be Beauregard and Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, Jessie! Come on, Laura.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, terrible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to use my boots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we already used the dodecahedron today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right. It's only whoever goes first probably survives.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not interfering with this fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm making no such promise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll keep them alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, 25 to 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'll just tell you. It's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lucky number nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As everyone gathers around the edges and the faint music begins to turn to a (drumming). One of the gnolls in the far back has begun to beat a small drum that's kept to the side and the bartender, looking over in the back, pulls out a small drum that he keeps behind the edge and he goes (light drumming), patting the top of this tiny little thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we get going, I take the bat guano that Caleb gave me and smoosh it in my hands, and smear it across my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's disgusting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's gross.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's pretty fucking awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do some special sequined glove flourishes. That's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're doing that, the drow and the ogre, everyone sizes each other up. There is a moment of a flinch, and you are first, Beau. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go to the drow, in between the drow and the ogre, butt in, and while running, pull my spear out and spin with a flourish and come around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards the drow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19, so that is a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah? Okay, that's a 27. That hits. Oh my god, I'm shaking. Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stunning strike, going right for the temple. Going for a quick knockout.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be 14. What's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crack! The drow looks back at you with an angry expression.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doing that again, going for the other side. Come on, bitch, that's not great. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time, the drow seems to notice and ducks out of the way, and using a reaction to slam you right into the face with its fist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With its fist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she a monk, too?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, she's got no armor on at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 12 points of bludgeoning damage, and I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's totally a fucking monk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! This could be so bad!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Constitution saving throw?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it just my presence within 30 feet that makes something not happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, if you want to keep it low key, because there is an action. It's not a high DC sleight of hand check to try to hide it if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you trying to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cancel a Natural 20. No, it's too soon, it feels like a cheat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel the fist strike into your head, and-- no, I'm sorry, the other one.

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: No, you can keep that, that's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No take backs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're stunned until the end of its next turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all right. You're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that's the end of your turn, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was just her turn, right? Now they're both--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But she did use her reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She did. Well, now it's her turn. She gets her reaction back, and she's going around this way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a theory about all of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to make three attacks against you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three attacks?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Against Beau?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, because you're stunned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a waste of a turn. Go after the ogre first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Totally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's stunned, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take ten points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 18 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Knowing it's not much of an issue, it's going to move--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why me?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards Jester. It's going to bonus action attempt to strike you. That's going to be 15 to hit. I don't believe that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put my shield up and my sequined glove comes up behind it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her drow eyes look up and narrow for a Flurry of Blows. Fourth attack. No, that's 13 to hit; it rolled really bad. It throws another punch and you deflect with the shield. For the rest of its movement, it's going to shift over in this direction. That finishes her turn. The ogre is now going to charge up toward both of you. He's going to make a strike against each, making the first attack against the monk. That hits! Yeah, it's a 23. That is 11 points of slashing damage with one shortsword. It's going to attempt to make another strike against you, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 21 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 13 points of slashing damage from the shortsword, slashes past from the other hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to use Hellish Rebuke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Is it a constitution saving throw?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a dex saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fails.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So as you shout that, everyone laughs and the ogre goes (laughs, groans) and you can see this confusion, this wave of "what the fuck" enter the ogre's face. That's your action?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my action. Yeah, that's a spell, so I can't do my other bonus action. I'm going to look over at the drow and be like: (laughs uncomfortably) Good times, huh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I shake it off really quick, wink at the guy in front of me, and I turn around and I'm going to use my staff to vault off of the floor, and I'm going to come down for an elbow to the ogre's throat.

lines.text: Okay, are you going on this side?

lines.text: Wow. 16.

lines.text: Okay! So let me make a little note. My staffy-staff-- six damage. Stunning strike! This guy's constitution is probably something stupid.

lines.text: As the staff slams into him, this ogre is solid muscle. Even though you hit right between where you can see a portion of the exposed nerve clusters would cause a like-size figure to buckle, no effect. This is a tough son of a bitch. That's your first attack.

lines.text: Yep.

lines.text: All righty.

lines.text: There's a moment where she lands and looks up at you and goes-- not quite sure where this is going. That's going to go ahead and finish the monk's turn. That brings us to the ogre's go. The ogre, who just got kicked in the face, goes (grunts in frustration). Slams a knee onto the ground, crosses the blades in front.

The monk just watching that happen, because it closes the rest of your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, man.

Okay, actually even with advantage, it was three and a four. The ogre is in the process of getting back up off the ground, and rolls out just as the final attack comes down and blasts into the nearby gravel and stone, pulls its fist back and you see there's stones kind of pressed into the skin with a little of blood starting to pour down. The ogre angrily gets up for its turn. It's going to take two strikes at you, Jester. Then action surge and take two strikes on the monk.

As you pull back, looking at the blood in your hand from the recoiling, you look up in time just as the other shortsword pierces underneath the shield and catches you in the abdomen. lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: All right, are you going to stay right there? You got it. Okay, that finishes Jester's go.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Second attack! I try and bring up the staff from my kneeling position and come up for under her jaw.

lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god! That's crazy, just roll another one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate everything. No. Just no. 11.

lines.text: 11, no. As you, after slamming the staff in the stomach, swing upwards, and she catches it, and with the momentum pulls you in, and then is going to kick you in the face as you're moving forward. Pop! That is going to be a 22 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that is going to be seven points of bludgeoning damage as her foot cracks you in the jaw. Your neck almost snaps. Not breaks, but almost whiplashes you from the impact. Is not going to attempt to stun you with that. You still have the rest of your turn. You have your bonus action.

lines.text: (singing Ballroom Blitz)

lines.text: Yeah!
