lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would that have been Jester's turn, had she not gone down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would have been, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then the cat continues to jig and dance, unless she does something about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that mean I get another advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On your first strike, against the drow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, all right. Try and use that dialled in focus. That one's cocked, everyone witnessed that. 18 plus four-- sorry, four plus 18. 22?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four plus eight? (babbling) Words?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Good thing you did that, because the other roll was a natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cat screech)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's looking rough. All right.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: She's looking rough?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but the ogre is still like...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ogre's still up. Ogre's hurt, but hanging in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One target at a tim-- (pigeon cooing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack at her. 19, which I think hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage, all righty. So whack, crack with the staff. Each time the drow's knocked to each side. You can see blood (splatter) across the gravel pit around her. Comes back up, one eye is a little bit half-closed, that focus coming in, not giving in to the urge to slip into the darkness. She's just focused on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural 18-- no, it's a 15, but that still hits. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sweep the leg!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's better than-- I just realized I've been rolling damage dice smaller than I should have been.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should have been rolling d8s for the staffs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're much more epic now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten damage. Fuck. That pisses me off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It happens. It happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17, misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 9 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's rolling the right dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's totally rolling the right fucking dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our girl's on the ropes, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she would be dead, yo!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (heartbeat)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to move around behind her and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flank-flank-flank.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's next, right? She just used her reaction to hit me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (heartbeat)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to bounce. I'm going to get right to the corner. I'm going to let her deal with the ogre.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This far?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Further, if I can. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to catch my breath in the corner, try not to puke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Her turn. She sees you rush away, sees her scenario and how rough it's going, looking at both sides. (heavy sigh) She's going to make two attacks on this ogre.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bring them both down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be glad you moved away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, don't want that for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next attack, natural 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After doing this, glancing at both of you, reaches forward. The ogre has both blades out and is chuckling now, licking the blood from under its lip where you can see it's split from one of the previous attacks in the battle, for a fourth time now. This jaw is just wrecked. Getting both blades at the side and is leaning forward, and the drow, still looking at you, just goes (impact), hits him right square in the junk.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right as the ogre (groan) leans forward angrily, grabs him over the head, and just brings his jaw down onto her shoulder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Tombstone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tombstones him, and you watch the ogre, both blades (metallic clattering) onto the stonework, and then shrugs him off, and he rolls onto the ground, unconscious, to her side. At which point, she uses a ki point, Patient Defense, as a bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Making it interesting!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then runs along the side, parkours off the side of the tavern, and lands right in front of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe just make out with her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disarming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion check? Nah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Disarming tongue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Disarming tongue!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now or later!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Spare the Dying on the ogre.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That'd be so fucking cheap, right? That'd be terrible. I shouldn't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I send Frumpkin running out that window, past the ogre. She's on her own. (meow)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Diamond still making slow progress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll another sleight of hand check for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Not as good. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It continues to move, and everyone else is invested in this fight, and one of the goblins to your right goes, "Huh?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. Okay, good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where it stands. Beau, what're you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have any type of advantage or anything, right? Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Leave it to the dice, man. Leave it to the dice! Come on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take a chance. Roll the dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I exhale.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Roll the dice!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look for an opening in her defense. I'm dialing into her pupils and I'm looking for every little twitch of her finger or twitch of her head, and pop, pop! I'm going to go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck, disadvantage. Argh! That was a natural 20! But, 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come look at it. It's right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't believe you. You're the worst DM ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the CR symbol.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got another hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's fucking hitting me first!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's going to be toast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cancel the effect of the 20, but the hit still happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a sleight of hand check for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, should I not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do whatever you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it! Whatever you're doing, do it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I thought about it, nah. Let's let this happen. Such an invaluable lesson to be learned here, the more I think about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb's been wanting to cheat this

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it's ten points of bludgeoning damage to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, she's down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spare the Dying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, the final knuckle punch, there's this (echoing impact). The room gets quiet as you hear the breath suddenly fill the lungs of every creature watching in the room, and Beau stumbles back. Grin curls up on the face as one eye closes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: --and then (impact) face first into the gravel. The room erupts into cheers and laughter and drinks, whatever. The drow looks over and walks over, wobbles for a second. Two hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (frustrated yell)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is exactly what happened to Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's exactly what happened in the crucible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Kern 2.0!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to wake the two of them up really quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As people are cheering, I'm going to pull the diamond.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine points for you, nine points for you, you're both--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a sleight of hand check. This is against the monk's perception.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At advantage with everybody going crazy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not this monk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 23 and I'm going to fling the diamond towards that goblin who saw it but try to aim into the pocket of the guy standing next to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around and one of the Kryn warriors who's been watching in the corner in full armor and helmet looks right at the orc and goes-- and the orc goes (disappointed sigh) and sheepishly walks over towards the monk as she's collecting her winnings and hands it to her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She didn't even see it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the insanity dies down, Caduceus helps you up. The ogre gets up and is like (painful groans) rubbing his crotch area. Seems to be pressing the flesh to try and find out where one of the testicles may have been lodged upward in the body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in there somewhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's on a vision quest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's already to Ghor Dranas; it beat you there. Everything calms down a bit and whereas when you enter the room, there was that-- the glares of, "What the fuck is this human doing here?" and your activities as you entered didn't seem to improve that. When the fight is over, these same creatures and most everyone in the room gives you this nod of respect. Even though you didn't win the bout, there seems to be at least an appreciation of what you managed to accomplish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking-- that's all I wanted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are the rest of you guys doing as Beau and Jester-- Jester, as you walk by to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I help Jester up (groan).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ogre doesn't even approach either of you. He's extremely embarrassed by the display--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I have bat guano in my eye. And blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys did really good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fell first, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, we all knew that that was going to happen--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sort of a little bit, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beau, you almost won.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you learn anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I need to get better at beating people's asses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nuanced, I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the squeak of wood on the stone floor of the establishment as a chair gets pushed up the table, and the drow monk that you had just fought sits down at the table with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Yes. This is where this is all leading. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I get the feeling that perhaps there is more than meets the eye amongst you all. You don't smell of this land. I'm--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, you go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm impressed. What do you want?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where'd you train?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come walk with me." The monk stands up and leaves the Four Corners.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait a minute--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did that talk count as a short rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there one entrance and exit out of the Four Corners? One door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a back exit, but you watch as the monk leaves through the front.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll head up for the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wait a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait for Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll cast Cure Wounds on you, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, at second level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are they leaving, over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're exiting through the front door this way. Fjord, you're going through this exit, you said?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm. I'll wrap around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay, thank you! That is not bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha goes ahead and joins you as well, heads out the back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's-- oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're leaving, come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? I'm going to follow wherever you're going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Out the back door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? Yeah, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go out the back door, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go out the front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As both Jester and Beau leave, a few of the patrons raise a glass and (deep chuckle), "Very good!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) The most polite Four Corners combatant ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you follow out the front, the monk is passing on the north road around the corner and-- make a perception check, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: where did they go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh... Yeah, I just pick a direction and start jogging.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a new character. Most unceremonious end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled perception so low he left the campaign.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to wait just half a second and follow out the front door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see her go around the corner? To the east, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, actually. As you leave and look out, she is about two blocks up the way and is leaning against the wall looking over the shoulder to see you exit, and as soon as you step out into the road, ducks into an alley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do I get the sense that the alley spills out the other side? Can I go up a block and then block around behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It might. You haven't walked over in that area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's try that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. What if she like, you know, just wants to make out with you or something? Do you think-- am I intruding?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I mean, you can watch. Would that make you uncomfortable? Nah, anyway-- it's kind of a joke.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. What if she's the spy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think she might be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think she might be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if she thinks

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought about that too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if she's actually planning on killing you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Collecting the bounty?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm, it's possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have a lot of health right now; we took a beating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should definitely go by yourselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's probably waiting in an alleyway right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Literally waiting to murder me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you know what? She also took a beating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now it's two against one and we sort of healed up a little bit, so fuck her and we can do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I thought about that too, and I'm sure other people are looking for this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks hurt enough to have been when she exited at two hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Who all's going with Beau? Yasha and you are at the back trying to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lost as fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just lost.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm watching them, just like, I don't know what's happening. This is great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) So Caduceus and Fjord and Yasha are tourists--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I went back with them too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Nott catches up--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to catch up with um-- with uh-- we're going to... (whistles). Hey!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can send a message if I know which direction they are, so I'm going to pick a direction. Caleb, can you hear me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's-- we'll head towards the center of the-- yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Aurora? The Aurora Hold? The tower. The bar? Shit, we need a leader! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think the ladies probably have it, but I'm going to do a little choo-choo train. I snap Frumpkin here. Frumpkin will follow them by 15 feet and I will follow Frumpkin 15 back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Scowl's Square, sorry. That's what I was looking for in my notes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we get to the corner and they go in, I'm going to wait at the corner and Frumpkin will go around a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Both of you follow into the alleyway and, about two buildings down to the left, there appears to be a storage shack of some kind, and you see the monk is standing with the door ajar and gives a nod to you, and then enters and closes the door behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around and make sure no one's following, no one saw us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me. Okay, okay, okay. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. Looking around, you see Caleb. You see Frumpkin. But no one seems to be specifically following you. I mean, you don't even know where the rest of your party is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lost as fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just give a nod to Caleb and then go with Jester to the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a-- this way's a circle line so we have to-- we may have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I feel like we were supposed to be on the red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no beginning or end to it. It's the red checkered line that we need.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to sprint Frumpkin up and he will climb up Jester's back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin comes up and perches around the back of your neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sprinkle seems very uncomfortable with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Puffs up and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget also is not too fond of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a menagerie right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Just a walking petting zoo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where were they during the fight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sitting off to the side with Fjord, obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys enter-- I mean, it looks like a slightly larger outhouse. As the door opens-- thankfully it's not an outhouse-- the smell that gets to you is like musty grains.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Musty grains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good band.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But since there aren't a lot of grain fields in the area, you're not sure what the smell's coming from. But there are a few dried sacks and one looks like the bottom is somewhat mildewing from maybe some moisture that may have gotten in from a nearby rain through the roof. But the chamber is about ten foot by eight foot and it's a very, very tight space. But in the back corner, you see the Drow, arms crossed, looking at you expectantly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you call us here to give us back the diamond that we gave you because that's very kind of you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Close the door."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You close the door. It is dark. You can't see anything, Beau. You put the goggles on. You see the monk reaches into their pouch and tosses the diamond back to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (surprised yelling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say what?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Best fight ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the image of the monk shifts and fades.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fucking knew it! It's Dairon! It's Dairon!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks at you and goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fucking knew it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The fact that you're this far, it does not bode well. I am extremely curious how you happened to--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just go up and I give her a big hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (surprised noise) (clears throat)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quietly) Just a hug? (snickering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you were dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's been looking for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hadn't heard from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, that was a-- it was a story to tell everyone--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) I sent you a message!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you remember?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, at the very least, let us go ahead and compare notes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (excited yelling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I was hoping. I was hoping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys, we didn't lose the diamond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the most important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you're not wrong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once again, years later, damage dice makes all the difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, yeah. That's what happened in the Grog fight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Straight up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was rolling d8s and then, at some point, I looked down and I had d6s in my hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I watched you roll d6s that whole time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a decent amount of time. Then I realized wait, how long have I been rolling d6s? Like, I think--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spotlight. Stunts us all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Subconsciously, something in the back of Beau's mind was causing her to draw-- to pull the punches a little bit.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, ooh, ooh, sexy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trying to narratively make it work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My fists are magical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But we'll pick up on this reunion next week and see the scenarios working around it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got panels and signings and all kinds of cool stuff. Hopefully see you there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other than that, Monday--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Monday, the kickstarter drops for--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 10 AM Pacific!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Legends of Vox Machina.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tune in!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You cannot be prepared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have a Q and A happening on our channel that night at 7PM.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quois? The quois?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With you three. To just-- yeah, do the quois.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Talk about the project and everything about it. So yeah. Some fun stuff, guys. Some fun stuff!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for watching, guys. We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering) [music]
